investor fund to escrow account & the rest to issuer wallet;         Step 5 - Transfer deal token from Deal contract to each investor account         Step 6 - Update all relevant details for the issuance, the issuer, and the devdoc.author: 0xYue
devdoc.details: USDC stablecoin tracker address needs to be changed to Ethereum mainnet when we're ready to deployTo link libraries developed to check existing issuer/investor/deal before adding new ones with this main contract!!Oversized now!!! Must break this into a few separate contracts such as Helper functions, event interface, etc.To add @param to all sub-functionsTo implement all Ownable and Pausible functionsTo finalize all events and ModifiersTo check and finalize all function visibilitiesTo implement more search functionsTo use SafeMath at all places (incl ++ calculations)To change to SafeERC20 functions laterTo integrate with Chainlink oracle adaptors and keepersTo implement decimals to our DealTokenTo implement global fee

closeDealOffering(string).details: TODIItem - To be integrated with Chainlink keepers when timestamp clicks pre-set offerCloseTime

createDealIssuance(string,string,uint256.details: Ignored escrowRatio for now, assuming a fixed 5%Might need to break this into a few separate sub-functions coz stack can become too deep

editDealIssuance(string,string,uint256,u.details: For now we do NOT allow issuers to change ISIN and faceValue (to avoid stack too deep)

getAllInvestorDetails(address).details: Get investor details - investors can view their own details via this function call

getIssuanceSizePriceTotalBidDetailsByISI.details: split DealIssuance getter functions into a few separate ones, otherwise stack too deep :(

getIssuanceStateNameRateDatesDetailsByIS.details: split DealIssuance getter functions into a few separate ones, otherwise stack too deep :(

investorEditBid(string,address,uint256).details: this is only allowed before deal offer period is closed

investorMakeDeposit(uint256).details: Implement USDC transfer here after getting some test USDCs

devdoc.title: Deal

closeDealOffering(string).notice: Step 1 - Close deal offering (book-building) process;         Step 2 - Decide whether to launch the official issuance period, or cancel;         Step 3 - Mint DealToken for the issuance, calculate investor allocation then allocate accordingly;         Step 4 - Transfer investor fund to escrow account & the rest to issuer wallet;         Step 5 - Transfer deal token from Deal contract to each investor account         Step 6 - Update all relevant details for the issuance, the issuer, and the investors

createDealIssuance(string,string,uint256.notice: Create a new deal issuance, set its details in storage, & offer period starts

createIssuer(string,string).notice: Create issuer & set meta data details

createTokenMetaData(string,string).notice: Create token meta data (name & symbol) for a new issuance

editDealIssuance(string,string,uint256,u.notice: Update details of a deal issuance after it's created & before the offer period is closed

editTokenMetaData(string,string).notice: Edit token meta data for the corresponding issuance

getAllIssuerDetailsByAddr(address).notice: Get all issuer details by issuer address; must be called by issuer

getBidDetails(string,address).notice: Investor gets details of a bid made earlier

getIssuanceSizePriceTotalBidDetailsByISI.notice: Get issuance details (size, price, fee, escrow, total invetor bid) by issuance ISIN

getIssuanceStateNameRateDatesDetailsByIS.notice: Get issuance details (state, name, dates, terms) by issuance ISIN

getIssuerMetaDataByISIN(string).notice: Get public issuer details by issuance ISIN

getTokenDetails(string).notice: Get token details for the corresponding issuance

investorMakeBid(string,uint256).notice: Investor makes a bid to invest in an issuance during offer period

investorMakeDeposit(uint256).notice: Investor deposit stablecoin fund (USDC) into the dapp

userdoc.notice: This contract represents the entire deal issuance book-building process (incl creation of new deals and minting/allocation of the deal token
